Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Curvicin (cecropin, UCSS1a; natural AMPs; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)

Literature.Author: Henao Arias DC, Toro LJ, Téllez Ramirez GA, Osorio-Méndez JF, Rodríguez-Carlos A, Valle J, Marín-Luevano SP, Rivas-Santiago B, Andreu D, Castaño Osorio JC. 2021
Literature.Title: Novel antimicrobial cecropins derived from O. curvicornis and D. satanas dung beetles.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (94.87%) toOxysterlin 1V=K: 18%, G=E=R: 10%. GRAVY: -0.523; mol wt: 4413.22; mol formula: C200H337N60O52; mol ex coeff: 5550.Activity: active against Gram- E. coli ATCC 25922 or ATCC 35218 (MIC 6.25 ug/ml), P. aeruginosa ATCC 105663 (MIC 6.25 ug/ml), K. pneumoniae ATCC BAA 170513 (MIC 3.12 ug/ml), Gram+ S.aureus ATCC 29213 (MIC>100 ug/ml), E.faecalis ATCC 29212  (MIC >100 ug/ml), fungi C.parapsilosis ATCC 22019 (MIC >100 ug/ml).
